subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Three of the N.F.L.’s best defensive ends, the Giants’ Osi Umenyiora and the Bears’ Mark Anderson and Adewale Ogunleye, are bachelors and best friends who will share a house this off-season.
snippet: Three of the N.F.L.’s best defensive ends, the Giants’ Osi Umenyiora and the Bears’ Mark Anderson and Adewale Ogunleye, are bachelors and best friends who will share a house this off-season.
